product_name: Columbia Silver Ridge III Shorts - Girls'
long_description: The light yet rugged Columbia Silver Ridge III Shorts keep girls cool with sweat-wicking, breathable, quick-drying comfort and UPF protection from the sun during long hours outside. Tough nylon fabric with Omni-Wick(R) treatment pulls moisture away from the skin and speeds drying. Omni-Shade(R) fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. The Columbia Silver Ridge III Shorts feature an internal adjustable waistband that ensures a perfect fit.
short_description: The light yet rugged Columbia Silver Ridge III Shorts keep girls cool with sweat-wicking, breathable, quick-drying comfort and UPF protection from the sun during long hours outside.
